channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Ready for cooler temps? See what to expect in Florida this weekend, fall. The news isn't great

Amazon says it's ending the Prime Invitee program. Here are the details.
item.description: Amazon wants users who don't live with a Prime account holder to sign up for their own memberships.

item.title: Judge in Gilgo Beach murders case allows advanced DNA evidence, a 1st for N.Y.

item.title: WATCH: Wedding crasher steals $60,000 in gifts to bride and groom
item.description: Police are searching for a wedding crasher who stole about $60,000 in cash and checks intended for a Southern California bride and groom.

item.title: Photos show wildfire burning through historic California Gold Rush town
item.description: A wildfire known as the 6-5 Fire​ has scorched homes in a historic California Gold Rush town that was settled around 1850 by Chinese miners.

item.title: Missouri takes up Trump’s redistricting effort in Republican push to win more US House seats

item.description: Several Jeffrey Epstein survivors made a direct appeal to President Trump to take action as they demanded all the files be released.
